mapper.select: select d.*, m.* from deliver_208201302 d right join material_208201302 m on d.material_id = m.id where (d.deliver_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}) order by d.deliver_no asc

select * from deliver_208201302 s right join material_208201302 m on s.material_id = m.id where IFNULL(s.deliver_time, '') != '' order by s.deliver_time desc, s.deliver_no desc limit #{pageSize} offset ${(pageNum - 1) * pageSize}

SELECT m.name AS materialName, CAST(SUM(d.deliver_count) AS SIGNED) AS totalDeliverCount FROM material_208201302 m INNER JOIN deliver_208201302 d ON m.id = d.material_id WHERE d.deliver_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY m.name ORDER BY totalDeliverCount ASC
